description.text: Buttons make common actions more obvious and help users more easily perform them. Buttons use labels and sometimes icons to communicate the action that will occur when the user touches them.
Switches allow users to turn an individual option on or off. They are usually used to activate or deactivate a specific setting.
Lists are a continuous group of text or images. They are composed of items containing primary and supplemental actions, which are represented by icons and text.
Lists are a continuous group of text or images. They are composed of items containing primary and supplemental actions, which are represented by icons and text.
Radio group allows user to select one option from a set of options. Use value on group to set the selected option.
